                 String classFieldName,
                 String docFieldName,
                 String fieldType)
        Register a new mapping between a field from the persisted class to a MongoDocument field.
        Parameters:
        docNameFromMapping - name of the document as defined in the mapping
        classFieldName - name of the field in the persisted class
        docFieldName - name of the field in the mondo document
        fieldType - type of the field
